00043 static const char *me = NULL;
00044 static bool quiet = false;
00045 static cvq *vq = NULL;

00047 /*
00048  *
00049  */
00050 void usage()
00051 {
00052     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [-q] (e-mail){1,}"<<endl
00053         <<"\t-q\tquiet mode"<<endl
00054         <<endl
00055         <<"Delete users. It copies all files from users's mailbox to delete"<<endl
00056         <<"directory in home dir. So it's possible to restore user's messages."<<endl;
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool user_rm(const string &e)
00060 {
00061     string u, d;
00062     string::size_type atpos;
00063     if(!quiet) cout<<e<<": ";
00064     if( (atpos=e.find('@')) == string::npos
00065         || (u = e.substr(0,atpos)).empty()
00066         || (d = e.substr(atpos+1)).empty() ) {
00067             if(!quiet)
00068                     cout<<"invalid e-mail"<<endl;
00069             return quiet;
00070     }
00071     char ret;
00072     if((ret=vq->user_rm(u,d))) {
00073             if(!quiet)
00074                     cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00075             return quiet;
00076     } else {
00077             if(!quiet)
00078                     cout<<"user was removed."<<endl;
00079     }
00080     return 0;
00081 }

00083  *
00084  */
00085 int main(int ac, char **av)
00086 {
00087     me = *av;
00088     try {
00089             int opt;
00090             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"rqh")) != -1 ) {
00091                     switch(opt) {
00092                     case 'q':
00093                             quiet = true;
00094                             break;
00095                     default:        
00096                     case '?':
00097                     case 'h':
00098                             usage();
00099                             return(1);
00100                     }
00101             }
00102             ac -= optind;
00103             av += optind;
00104             if( ! ac ) {
00105                     usage();
00106                     return(1);
00107             }
00108 
00109             vq = cvq::alloc();
00110 
00111             if(quiet) ac = 1;
00112             for(int i=0; i < ac; i++ ) {
00113                     if( user_rm(av[i]) )
00114                             return 1;
00115             }
00116     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00117             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00118             return 1;
00119     }
00120     return 0;
00121 }
